title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical surface to the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & completion bindings to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming and async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) for chatting with Ollama models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune, quantize, deploy, build chatbots, Discord bots, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Convert and import GPT4All models into Ollama’s Modelfile format.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in servers or DMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to pull, build and test Ollama models in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, parameter sliders and RAG via Chroma.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama with synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with dependency injection helpers.
